title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2351/95 of 6 October 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 1445/95 on rules of application for import and export licences in the beef and veal sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2351/95 of 6 October 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 1445/95 on  rules of application for import and export licences in the beef and veal sector
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 7 October 1995.
It shall apply to export licences with advance fixing of the refund applied for from 9 October 1995  onwards.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 October 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
